summary: This is a forwarded email from November 19, 2021, containing a subject line referencing an external letter from a client labeled as a 'Confidential Communication'. The email includes an attachment named 'PRIVATE_AND_CONFIDENTIAL_2.pdf' and mentions the client's name as 'Con: Siimm'.

persons.name: Con: Siimm
persons.context: The client who authored the attached confidential letter mentioned in the email subject and body.

events.title: Forwarding of Confidential Client Letter
events.description: An email was forwarded containing an external letter from a client labeled as a confidential communication, with an attached PDF file.

keyFacts: The document is a forwarded email dated November 19, 2021, concerning a confidential communication from a client.
The client is identified as 'Con: Siimm', who authored an attached letter.
The email includes an attachment named 'PRIVATE_AND_CONFIDENTIAL_2.pdf'.
The subject line indicates the communication is external and confidential.
